item.title: EP 206 - The Haunted Vending Machine Of Seattle
item.itunes:title: The Haunted Vending Machine Of Seattle
item.description:
A young woman travels to Colorado and the entire state panics, and then we go to Seattle to investigate a haunted vending machine!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Timeline: The search for Sol Pais, Florida teen “infatuated with Columbine”

https://www.denverpost.com/2019/04/19/sol-pais-search-timeline/amp/

 

Sol Pais likely killed herself Monday, long before “massive manhunt” that closed hundreds of schools, undersheriff says

https://www.denverpost.com/2019/04/19/sol-pais-manhunt-mount-evans-suicide/

 

‘Just Come Home’: Father’s Last Words for Daughter Who Died in Columbine-Related Manhunt

https://www.thedailybeast.com/father-of-sol-pais-hunted-by-fbi-near-columbine-wants-her-to-come-home

 

Who Was Sol Pais, the Woman Sought in Colorado?

https://www.nytimes.com/2019/04/17/us/sol-pais-columbine.html

 

Sol Pais Website

https://dissolvedgirl.neocities.org/

 

Is This Seattle Vending Machine Haunted?

https://www.coca-colacompany.com/stories/is-this-seattle-vending-machine-haunted

Spoiler Alert: Mystery of the Capitol Hill Mystery Coke Machine’s mysteries REVEALED

http://www.capitolhillseattle.com/2014/05/spoiler-alert-mystery-of-the-capitol-hill-mystery-coke-machines-mysteries-revealed/

 

Seattle’s Mystery Soda Machine Has Gone Missing

https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/seattle-mystery-soda-machine-is-missing

 

Mystery Soda Machine

https://www.atlasobscura.com/places/mystery-soda-machine

 

Coke Mystery Vending Machine

https://obscurban-legend.fandom.com/wiki/Coke_Mystery_Vending_Machine

 

Capitol Hill’s ‘supernatural’ pop machine stays stocked, but how? Nobody knows

https://www.seattletimes.com/seattle-news/capitol-hills-magical-pop-machine-stays-stocked-and-a-mystery/

 

COKE MACHINE, NEAR CORNER OF JOHN & BROADWAY

https://www.thestranger.com/seattle/coke-machine-near-corner-of-john--broadway/Content?oid=12375

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
